name: perform_cosinor_analysis
description: Performs cosinor analysis on physiological time series data to characterize circadian rhythms.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: time_data
inputs.description: Time points of the measurements in hours

inputs.name: physiological_data
inputs.description: Physiological measurements corresponding to each time point

inputs.name: period
inputs.description: Period of the rhythm in hours, default is 24 hours for circadian rhythms

output.description: A research log summarizing the cosinor analysis process and results
